participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and resilient, Emma loves to motivate others and has a strong passion for health and fitness.
participant_1.background: I am a cancer survivor. I am a clean eater. I got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. I love running and preparing for marathons.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and supportive, Jordan is a team player who enjoys being active and connecting with others.
participant_2.background: My father is in the army. I love playing softball. I recently was fired and had to get a new job. I work in the insurance business.

content.text: Hi, My name is Emma and i love to working, but now i havent got a job, thats make me unhappy? is there anybody , who is not working like me?
i worked in the Ä±nsurance business and i m sure, that i will find a new job in short time,
now i have time to do some sport and habbits, i love playing softball?
do u like pplaying softball too?
tahts a very bad feeling, to not working, is there anybody, who share the same feelings, we can talk about this, i m sure it makes me happier
its look like u dont wana talk with me, doesnt matter, i wish everone finds someone to talk
